document.full_text: the cannes film festival is gearing up for what critics say should be a vintage year, with hollywood stars out in force, revered directors there in droves and political controversy thrown into the mix.
document.title: glamour, art, politics collide at classic cannes
lines_and_colors: the cannes film festival is gearing up for what critics say should be a vintage year, with hollywood stars out in force, revered directors there in droves and political controversy thrown into the mix.
